tidbits.title: Innovation and Design
tidbits.description: Sweden is known for its innovation, contributing to global brands like IKEA, Spotify, and Ericsson. It's also renowned for design, including modern architecture and fashion.

tidbits.title: Nature and Wilderness
tidbits.description: The country boasts stunning natural landscapes, from vast forests and thousands of coastal islands to the northern Lapland region, offering unique experiences like the Northern Lights.

tidbits.title: Social Welfare
tidbits.description: Sweden is known for its social welfare system, promoting equality and providing citizens with comprehensive healthcare, education, and social benefits.
